1:4: making mention of you in my prayers
1:5: and of the faith which you have toward the Lord Jesus
1:6: in the knowledge of every good thing which is in us in Christ Jesus.
1:7: because the hearts of the saints have been refreshed through you
1:8: though I have all boldness in Christ to command you that which is appropriate
1:9: being such a one as Paul
1:10: whom I have become the father of in my chains
1:11: but now is useful to you and to me.
1:13: that on your behalf he might serve me in my chains for the Good News.
1:14: that your goodness would not be as of necessity
1:15: that you would have him forever
1:17: receive him as you would receive me.
1:22: prepare a guest room for me
1:23: my fellow prisoner in Christ Jesus
1:25: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.
